original_text: Each tree is recognized by its own fruit. People do not pick figs from thornbushes, or grapes from briers.
korean_text: 나무는 각각 그 열매로 아나니 가시나무에서 무화과를, 또는 찔레에서 포도를 따지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: Each tree is recognized by its own fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 각 나무는 그 열매로 알 수 있다

sentences.original_text: People do not pick figs from thornbushes
